resources.string:
"Because currently approved CGM devices are not as accurate and reliable as standard blood glucose meters, users should confirm glucose levels with a meter before making a change in treatment.

 This resource is not designed for diagnostic or treatment purposes.

 This is not the official Libre Andoid App. The Developer of this App is not liable for damages that may arise during reading the sensor or because of incorrect values.

 Displayed values may differ from the actual blood sugar.

 Currently still in development!"
Verify the displayed value with a Glucose meter!
